```{r include = F}


# qq plots
qq_wrapper <- function(exposure, hrc_version, statistic, filename_suffix = "") {
  knitr::include_graphics(glue("{path}/output/qq_{exposure}_{hrc_version}_{statistic}.png"))
}
```

### G
```{r , echo=FALSE, out.width = '100%'}
qq_wrapper(exposure = params$exposure, hrc_version = params$hrc_version, statistic = 'chiSqG')
```

### GxE
```{r , echo=FALSE, out.width = '100%'}

```
